document_data.name: ''Trapmaster's Hood''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Trapmaster's hoods''''' were a type of [[enchanted]] [[thieves]]' headwear, in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: These hoods possessed magics that enhanced the wearer's sight, allowing them to see the most intricate details of any [[trap]]s or [[lock]]s, resulting in drastic improvements of their thieving and roguish skills.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, ''trapmaster's hoods'' could be found among various inhabitants of the [[Sword Mountains]], areas surrounding the city of [[Neverwinter]], its markets, and the ancient ruins of [[Illefarn]].
